attributes.action: *NOT* ban the RSS (Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh), In The UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Just because you dont agree with something, doesn't mean it should be banned, no mater how offensive it may seem. If things like this go through, then we have given up our rights as free citizens, and we will lose out in the long run.

p.s. I am not a supporter of the RSS.
